content: Any statements contained in this call that relate to expectations or predictions of future events, results or performance are forward-looking statements, including, but not limited to, statements relating to Rapid Microâs financial condition, anticipated year-end cash balance, cash runway and future revenue and system placements, expectations for our projected cost savings resulting from the organizational restructuring actions, expectations for business development and growth, the Board of Directorsâ review of potential strategic alternatives, customer interest and adoption of the Growth Direct System, expectations for new â for our new RMBNucleus Mold Alarm and the potential impact of macroeconomic uncertainty and COVID-19 on Rapid Microâs business.
